pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Tranquil & Calm Hand Wash 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Give yourself a pat on the back! This bottle is made from recycled plastic and is also recyclable, which means you are helping to reduce our waste on this beautiful planet and we are all one step closer to sustainable living. Mother Nature thanks you!

Warnings

STORE AT BELOW 30°C.NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY.KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES.

Common Uses

The crisp aroma of Eucalyptus and Peppermint is tempered by the woody base of Copaiba to wash away the burden of worry and concern and transport mind and body to a tranquil space.

Ingredients

Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Decyl Glucoside, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Eucalyptus globulus (Blue Gum Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus staigeriana (Lemon Ironbark) Branch/ Leaf Oil, Copaifera officinalis (Copaiba) Resin Oil, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Laurus nobilis (Laurel) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus radiata (Eucalyptus Australiana) Leaf/ Stem Oil, Callitris intratropica (Blue Cypress) Wood Oil, Matricaria chamomilla (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance
